game.title: The Last Hope
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world where the sun has disappeared, humanity's last survivors live in a underground city called New Eden. The once-thriving metropolis is now on the brink of collapse, and it's up to you to find a solution to save what's left of human civilization.
game.beginning: You begin your journey as a young scientist who has lost family members in the disaster. Your goal is to uncover the truth behind the sun's disappearance and find a way to restore it.
game.ending: Your quest takes you across treacherous landscapes, from abandoned cities to mysterious ruins, where you must face off against ruthless warlords, rival factions, and even ancient creatures that have adapted to the dark world. With each new discovery, the path to salvation becomes clearer, but so do the challenges ahead.
